Truly, we believe in You,Â / O Christ our Master, have mercy on usÂ / for the sake of the Mother of GodÂ / and Abba Isi and Thecla.

Title.Language: Psali Watos for the Martyrdom of Saints Isi and Thecla His Sister

Let us begin, my beloved,Â / to glorify Jesus Christ,Â / and honor the TheotokosÂ / and Abba Isi and his sister Thecla.

Come David, into our midst today,Â / to utter the honor of these martyrsÂ / of Christ, the King of Glory,Â / Saints Abba Isi and Thecla his sister.

â€œThe righteous cried out to the Lord,Â / and He heard them in their persecution.â€?Â / I mean these two martyrs:Â / Abba Isi and Thecla his sister.
